properties.name: S3.bucket
properties.description: The name of the S3 bucket to store media in.

properties.name: S3.endpoint.url
properties.description: The url of the S3 endpoint without protocol.

properties.name: S3.endpoint.region
properties.description: The region of the S3 endpoint (ams3 for example).

properties.name: S3.credentials.access-key
properties.description: The access key (username) of the S3 credentials.

properties.name: S3.credentials.secret-key
properties.description: The secret key (password) of the S3 credentials.

properties.name: environment
properties.description: Disables certain features when testing locally (develop or production).

properties.name: filesystem.data-directory
properties.description: The location to store images when environment is develop.

properties.name: lifetime.day
properties.description: The maximum amount of days a verification can be opened for.

properties.name: lifetime.challenge
properties.description: The maximum amount of challenges a verification can take.

properties.name: superuser.hashed-password
properties.description: The ArgonID hashed password of the superuser.

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: 256 bit secret key for signing the JWT.

properties.name: jwt.lifetime
properties.description: The max lifetime of a JWT and cookie in milliseconds.

properties.name: jwt.cookie-name
properties.description: The name of the cookie containing the JWT.

properties.name: jwt.cookie-secure
properties.description: Sets the JWT cookie to secure or insecure.

properties.name: cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: List of allowed origins separated by a comma.

properties.name: jwt.cookie.restrict-site
properties.description: Set to true to prevent the JWT cookie from being sent to other sites.
